title: Su-asa
author: Su-asa
content: Normally normally we are talking about to buy Bitcoin now but this evening something came to my mind and I will like us to talk about it and also be aware of it too.The things way i won talk be say, as the bull dey front dey come, e go good if those way done invest for Bitcoin earlier this year and way back dey careful this season and the whole of the next year and after, because I really believe say plenty of scammers go dey more active to dey find those way them go scam (more especially Bitcoiners).As e no go dey good if person sweat go just enter into the hands of scammers nai make me say make I drop am here but if this kind of post already dey this our board or outside the board abeg make una tell me so that I go lock am ASAP.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Not only the bitcoiners are scammers targets, but everybody they come across . It is people that should learn, make research and avoid scam. When I starting knowing about bitcoin and cryptocurrencies in general, the first I did was that I researched on how to avoid scam. If you check my earliest topics, they are more about avoiding crypto scam and hack.This topic would have been good if you add the examples of scam and how to avoid, but you did not include any. Scam increase during bull run, but there have always been scam. If you want to know, just find a presale coin, join their telegram group and post something. You will see how scammers will message you so that you can connect to their fake site with your wallet so that they can stole all your coins.I can still remember the Elon Musk SNL that fake Elon Musk speech was shown after a break. The speech was about scammers using Elon Mush fake speech that people should send money to a doge address, that they will receive double immediately. The scammer address was funded with over $5 million not quite long before it was said to be a scam. There are scam like this on social media.Another example are the celebrities and well known people that their Twitter account were hacked and used to lure victims to send coins to a provided addresses. How about the premium cloud mining that end as scam. They are many online.  How about airdrops scam. To pay VIP. Also your information can be known, like email which can be used to send phishing email. How about fake ICO which is completely an exit scam. Also are some pump and dump coins. We warned people on this local board not to buy digitoad for example. See the price of digitaod now after launch. People are losing money. I am not saying you should not buy presale coins or tokens, but do your research and use the amount of money that you can be able to afford to lose.While talking about money loss like this, it is also good to talk about hackers. Not the same as scam but both can lead to money loss and both can be interconnected as scammers can be a hacker.Put thoughts into what you are discussing next time. Not a criticism but an advice.

comments.author: Amphenomenon
comments.body: Scammers will always be innovative and so they will definitely find ways to scam investors especially this bullish season, where almost all crypto currency will be on the raise, alot of traders will be offering trading signals while most of them won`t even good at trading but because the market is bullish they will be lucky not be out of favour by the market. Alot of shitcoins and scam toekns promising huge returns to naive/ greedy investors who in the end be victimised while the development team get the gains and move on. There are still many ways scammers get the better of investors aside from the ones listed by both me and Charles-Tim but in the end its just for us to be cautious and anything that is too good to be true should be avoided. God helps us .

comments.body: Na better update you drop for us so because as Bitcoin price dey grows like this, scammers go find any possible means to take scam people off their Bitcoin because people go like invest in Bitcoin to make a profit and not to miss out on accumulating Bitcoin before the bull run go start. For instance, when Vitalik Buterin X (formerly Twitter) account was compromised, victims suffered losses of $691,000 due to a malicious link promoting a fake free NFT. Even if Satoshi gives you a BTC address to send BTC for the address, make you no send because it is a scam and make we no dey click on links wey we no sure of.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: In conclusion, every one should be careful, be it Bitcoiners or fiat investors because scammers target are not only for Bitcoin investors but to also individual who have a lot of money in their custody. During this period of the year, scammers are every where and they are looking for who to scam.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Su-asa on November 29, 2023, 08:44:18 PMThe things way i won talk be say, as the bull dey front dey come, e go good if those way done invest for Bitcoin earlier this year and way back dey careful this season and the whole of the next year and after, because I really believe say plenty of scammers go dey more active to dey find those way them go scam (more especially Bitcoiners).Bull market mean say alot of money will be flowing into the market and this money dey involve old money (from investors wey already dey into the industry) and new money (from new investors). The new investor's dey come in their number wey be say dem dey plenty die and lack proper knowledge of how the market be so this na why scammers dey chop dem scatter. Scammers know say newbies dem go plenty so dem dey target dem with mouth watering offers and many dey fall victims. You wey be investor, na you suppose secure your investment and you no supposed believe everything wey you see for online unless you go fall mugu to scammers.Different scams plenty during the bull market but e get one wey people no dey too reason because dem believe say everything wey dem invest inside you do well (most times e dey go that way but e no dey last). We need dey careful wetin we dey Invest inside because plenty altcoins go come out during this time. Many of dem no go fit survive after the bull market as the project founders only created the tokens for the bull market and after the market finish dem no get any plans for the bear market and the project go die so if you still dey invested inside them na you go lose am. During the bull market, ponzi scheme go plenty too and Bitcoin doublers go begin dey plenty but as a wise investor, we need dey avoid all this sites them and just dey hold the coins wey we dun buy for the bull market.For Nigeria here, we go begin here all sorts of defi platforms dem wey go dey promise all sorts of benefits, we need avoid them and not give out control over your coins to any platform wey go promised say dem go Invest for you or trade for you and dem go dey give you returns. This na some ways wey scammers dey steal people money during this bull market period.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: First, as an internet you always come across scammers it is inevitable and it gets worsen when you become a crypto user which is why at all time we have to be vigilant and to treat everyone we don't know as a suspect before anything else. When you create that attitude of treating people as suspect you will be careful on how you deal with them and whatever link you see online. And in the forum ignore all PM's from users you don't telling you about any juicy returns project, you will only end up being scammed.The bullrun period is the period scammers for the most part scavenge for gullible newbies with sugar coated approaches and promises about quick doubling of their crypto in a professional way, by using the excuse of them arriving at bitcoin late and for them to catch up the train quick at the pace of others they have to render certain personal informations to them (the scammers) to help them in doing the needed mechanics. Newbies be aware that all of these!.
